name: Dark Mysteries 4 Play Collection
summary:
A fantastic collection of dark and mysterious hidden-object adventures!Combines hours of seek and find gameplay with challenging puzzles and mini-games 
Each game features an intriguing storyline with mysterious twists and turns 
Pack includes Dark Mysteries The Soul Keeper. The Beast of Lycan Isle Collector's Edition, Mystery Murders -The Sleeping Palace, Detective Agency 3 
Ghost Painting
